panels.title: Cluster (Global)
On Demand Instance Type
Spot Instance Type

targets.expr:
sum(
  sum_over_time(
    (
    capacity_instance:spot_instance_cost:cost 
    OR 
    capacity_instance:on_demand_instance_cost:cost
    )
  [1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Total Daily Cluster Cost

targets.expr:
sum (
  sum_over_time(
    (
      zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:spot_idle_cpu_cost
      OR
      capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_idle_cpu_cost
      OR
      zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:spot_idle_mem_cost
      OR
      capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:on_demand_idle_mem_cost
    )
  [1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Idle Daily Cluster Cost

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
  sum (
  
      # See description for label_replace
      label_replace(
        zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
        OR
        capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
      , "resource", "CPU", "","")
      
      OR 
      
      label_replace(
        zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
        OR
        capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
      , "resource", "memory", "","")

)
[1d:1h])

panels.title: Usage Daily Cluster Cost

targets.expr:
sum (
  sum_over_time(
    (
          zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_cpu_price:spot_shared_cpu_cost
          OR
          capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_shared_cpu_cost
          OR
          zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_mem_price:spot_shared_mem_cost
          OR
          capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_shared_instance_mem_price:on_demand_shared_mem_cost
    )
  [1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Shared Daily Cluster Cost

targets.expr: sum (sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes/1024/1024/1024))
sum(sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes/1024/1024/1024) * $pvcost)

panels.title: Total Monthly PV Cost

targets.expr:
sum (
  sum_over_time(
    (
      zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:spot_idle_cpu_cost
      OR
      capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_idle_cpu_cost
      OR
      zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:spot_idle_mem_cost
      OR
      capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:on_demand_idle_mem_cost
    )
  [1d:1h])
)
-
sum_over_time(
  sum (
  
      # See description for label_replace
      label_replace(
          ((
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
              - 
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
          OR
          ((
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
              -
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
      , "resource", "CPU", "","")
      
      OR 
      
      label_replace(
          ((
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
              -
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
          OR
          ((
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
              -
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
      , "resource", "memory", "","")

)
[1d:1h])

panels.title: Underutilization Daily Cluster Cost

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  sum_over_time(
    (    
    capacity_instance:spot_instance_cost:cost 
    OR

    )
  [1d:1h])

panels.title: Daily Cluster Cost per Instance Type and Capacity Type

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
  (
    capacity_instance:spot_instance_cost:cost OR capacity_instance:on_demand_instance_cost:cost
  )
[1d:1h])

sum(
  sum_over_time(
    (
    capacity_instance:spot_instance_cost:cost OR capacity_instance:on_demand_instance_cost:cost
    )
  [1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily Cluster Cost per Instance and Capacity Type

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) (
    sum_over_time(
      (
        zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:spot_idle_cpu_cost
        OR
        capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_idle_cpu_cost
        OR
        zone_capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:spot_idle_mem_cost
        OR
        capacity_instance_node_resource:kube_node_status_allocatable_idle_instance_mem_price:on_demand_idle_mem_cost
      )
    [1d:1h])
)
)

panels.title: Daily Underutilization Cost per Instance Type and Capacity Type

panels.description:
label_replace is used to ALWAYS have a different label (resource) when doing OR, so that no time series is filtered by binary operations (capacity_type for internal OR, resource for external OR)

If for example a pod has CPU requests but not memory requests, the binary sum (+) will filter the CPU sum (will not count for them)

panels.title: Daily Shared Cost per Instance and Capacity Type

panels.description:
label_replace is used to ALWAYS have a different label (resource) when doing OR, so that no time series is filtered by binary operations (capacity_type for internal OR, resource for external OR)

If for example a pod has CPU requests but not memory requests, the binary sum (+) will filter the CPU sum (will not count for them)

targets.expr:
sort_desc (
sum_over_time(
  sum by (namespace) (
  
      # See description for label_replace
      label_replace(
          ((
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
              - 
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
          OR
          ((
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
              -
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
      , "resource", "CPU", "","")
      
      OR 
      
      label_replace(
          ((
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
              -
              zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
          OR
          ((
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
              -
              capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
          ) > 0)
      , "resource", "memory", "","")

)
[1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily Total Cost per Namespace

panels.description:
label_replace is used to ALWAYS have a different label (resource) when doing OR, so that no time series is filtered by binary operations (capacity_type for internal OR, resource for external OR)

If for example a pod has CPU requests but not memory requests, the binary sum (+) will filter the CPU sum (will not count for them)

targets.expr:
sort_desc (
sum_over_time(
  sum by (namespace) (
  
      # See description for label_replace
      label_replace(
          # If requests is bigger than usage, use requests. Otherwise use usage.
          (
            (
                zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
                > 
                zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
            )
            OR
            zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          )
          OR
          # If requests is bigger than usage, use requests. Otherwise use usage.
          (
            (
                capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
                >
                capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
            )
            OR
            zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
          )
      , "resource", "CPU", "","")
      
      OR 
      
      label_replace(
          # If requests is bigger than usage, use requests. Otherwise use usage.
          (
            (
                zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
                >
                zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
            )
            OR
            zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
          )
          OR
          # If requests is bigger than usage, use requests. Otherwise use usage.
          (
            (
                capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
                >
                capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
            ) 
            OR capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
          )
      , "resource", "memory", "","")

)
[1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily Underutilization Cost per Namespace

panels.description:
label_replace is used to ALWAYS have a different label (resource) when doing OR, so that no time series is filtered by binary operations (capacity_type for internal OR, resource for external OR)

If for example a pod has CPU requests but not memory requests, the binary sum (+) will filter the CPU sum (will not count for them)

targets.expr:
sort_desc (
sum_over_time(
    sum by (namespace) (
        # See description for label_replace
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
        , "resource", "CPU", "","")
        
        OR 
        
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
        , "resource", "memory", "","")

	)
[1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily Requests Cost per Namespace

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
sum_over_time(
    sum by (namespace) (
        # See description for label_replace
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
        , "resource", "CPU", "","")
        
        OR 
        
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
        , "resource", "memory", "","")

	)
[1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily Usage Cost per Namespace

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  sum_over_time(
    sum by (namespace) (
      label_replace(((
          (sum by (namespace) (zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost))
          -
          (sum by (namespace) (zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost))
      ) > 0), "cap", "SPOT", "","")
      OR
      label_replace(((
          (sum by (namespace) (capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost))
          -
          (sum by (namespace) (capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost))
      ) > 0), "cap", "ON_DEMAND", "","")
  )[1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily CPU Underutilization Cost Per Namespace

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
	sum_over_time(
		sum by (namespace) (

			zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
			OR
			capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost

		)
	[1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily CPU Requests Cost Per Namespace

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
	sum_over_time(
		sum by (namespace) (

			zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
			OR
			capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost

		)
	[1d:1h])
)

panels.title: Daily CPU Usage Cost Per Namespace

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  sum_over_time(
    sum by (namespace) (
      label_replace(((
          (sum by (namespace) (zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost))
          -
          (sum by (namespace) (zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost))
      ) > 0), "cap", "SPOT", "","")
      OR
      label_replace(((
          (sum by (namespace) (capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost))
          -
          (sum by (namespace) (capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost))
      ) > 0), "cap", "ON_DEMAND", "","")
  )[1d:1h])
)

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
	sum_over_time(
		sum by (namespace) (

			zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
			OR
			capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost

		)
	[1d:1h])
)

			OR
			capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost

	[1d:1h])

Namespace

panels.description:
label_replace is used to ALWAYS have a different label (resource) when doing OR, so that no time series is filtered by binary operations (capacity_type for internal OR, resource for external OR)

If for example a pod has CPU requests but not memory requests, the binary sum (+) will filter the CPU sum (will not count for them)
panels.title: Daily Total Cost per Pod

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  sum_over_time(
	sum by (label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, pod) (
      label_replace(((
          (zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost{namespace="$namespace"})
          -
          (zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost{namespace="$namespace"})
      ) > 0), "cap", "SPOT", "","")
      OR
      label_replace(((
          (capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost{namespace="$namespace"})
          -
          (capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost{namespace="$namespace"})
      ) > 0), "cap", "ON_DEMAND", "","")
  )[1d:1h])
)

renameByName.Value: Daily Memory Underutilization Cost per Pod

panels.title: Daily Memory Requests Costs Per Pod
Daily Memory Usage Costs Per Pod

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, pod) (
    sum by (pod, node) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
    * on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
    sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"})
)

panels.title: CPU Requests vs Usage Per Pod

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, pod) (
  sum by (pod, node) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", name!=""})
  * on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"})
)
